data.title: Ramp to A Main Paranoia Play
data.description: Off contact or noise, use this Paranoia lineup to contest for A Main control.

data.title: B Main Dark Cover One Way Hold
data.description: Hold B Main with this unorthodox one way Dark Cover lineup, as it enables you to spam Attackers as they push for the orb or aggressively.

data.title: Aggressive B Main Hold Paranoia Play
data.description: Coordinate a play with a teammate towards B Main with this Paranoia lineup.

data.title: A Main Default Dark Cover Hold From Main and Ramp
data.description: Use this Dark Cover lineup to slow down Attackers towards A Main.

data.title: Standard Mid Dark Cover Hold From Mail
data.description: Use this simple, but effective Mid Dark Cover lineup to force Attackers to slow down their push.
